body:
# Building your b2g package

Run |build.sh| to create a .deb package that includes
b2g and a gaia checkout.

Once the package is installed, you can use b2g in two ways:

1. Run /opt/b2g/launch.sh
2. A new X session is also installed, that runs b2g in full screen.
Just do a long press on the [Home] key to end the session.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: Packaging b2g for debian based distributions.
name: Deb-b2g
